message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for it. Can you consider that?
